PrecisAppointment of the HON. JOSEPH MICHAEL MacDONALD, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, as Associate Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, and as a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal, effective July 1, 1998.
